text: Juliette Atkinson won the singles tennis title by defeating reigning champion Helen Hellwig 6–4, 6–2, 6–1 in the Challenge Round of the 1895 U.S. Women's National Singles Championship. Atkinson had won the right to challenge Hellwig by defeating Elisabeth Moore 6–3, 7–5, 3–6, 6–0 in the final of the All Comers' competition. The event was played on outdoor grass courts and held at the Philadelphia Cricket Club in Wissahickon Heights, Chestnut Hill, Philadelphia from June 25 through June 29, 1895. ==Draw== ===Challenge round=== ===All Comers' finals=== ==References== Category:U.S. National Championships (tennis) by year – Women's Singles Category:1895 in American women's sports Category:June 1895 sports events Category:1895 U.S. National Championships (tennis) Category:1895 in women's tennis
title: 1895 U.S. National Championships – Women's Singles
